Pakar: Wajar Saja Jika TKD Pemprov DKI Jakarta Tinggi
04 Nov 2019, 11:02 by Mosita Dwi Septiasputri


Pakar: Wajar Saja Jika TKD Pemprov DKI Jakarta Tinggi

KBRN, Jakarta : Pakar Otonomi Daerah Prof Djohermansyah Djohan menilai wajar jika ASN Pemerintah Provinsi DKI Jakarta mendapatkan Tunjangan Kinerja Daerah (TKD) dengan syarat para ASN dapat memenuhi kewajban yang telah diberikan."Kalau soal penghasilan, soal gaji tunjangan sebetulnya itu kan memang hak pegawai, supaya dia hidup layak bisa menyekolahi anaknya, bisa membiayai keperluan. Jadi itu sih memang sah saja," jelasnya kepada RRI, Senin (4/11/2019).Menurutnya uang rakyat harus digunakan untuk hal yang baik. Publik pasti berharap bahwa pemerintah dapat memberikan pelayanan yang baik bagi publik."Tapi kan juga publik minta gini, oke gaji ditambah, tunjangan kinerja ditambah tapi juga harus punya prestasi, punya kinerja yang tinggi, pelayanan publik harus baik, dan jangan ada korupsi karena itu uang rakyat," katanya.Ia mengatakan bahwa sudah menjadi kewajiban negara apabila memberikan tunjangan yang tinggi untuk para ASN-nya, sepanjang para ASN dapat terus memberikan pelayanan yang terbaik untuk publik."Saya sebagai ahli melihat itu soal yang lumrah wajar, negara juga pemda juga harus memberi fasilitas, memberi penghasilan yang baik kepada pegawainya kalau dia di bayar baik maka kinerjanya akan baik, kalau orang dibayar rendah maka kinerjanya juga akan rendah," tutupnya.Sementara, Direktur Eksekutif Center for Budget Analysis (CBA) Uchok Sky Khadafi menilai tingginya Tunjangan Kinerja Daerah (TKD) Pemerintah Daerah Provinsi DKI Jakarta tidak sesuai dengan kinerja yang dilakukan Pemprov DKI Jakarta. Sampai saat ini, pelayanan Pemprov DKI dinilai masih lamban dan tidak membuka ruang saran bagi masyarakat."TKD memang sangat besar sekali, jangankan pemerintah daerah, pemerintah pusat saja bisa kalah dengan TKD tunjangan ini, kalau kita lihat ini tunjangan harus sejajar dengan kinerja dengan apa yang mereka bikin, pelayanan DKI masih sangat lamban dan jelek," jelasnya kepada RRI, Senin (4/11/2019).Untuk itu, Pemprov DKI harus memperbanyak infrastruktur di Jakarta dengan melibatkan masyarakat. Membuka ruang sarana publik, jadi suara masyarakat dapat menjadi pertimbangan bagi Pemprov DKI."Kalau masa pelayanan kaya gitu, ya misalnya di RS masih antre sekolah-sekolah masih ada yang rusak tidak bagus, jalan-jalan masih banyak berlubang, DKI kadang-kadang kurang membuka partisipasi masyarakat tidak dibuka ruangnya, main dibangun-bangun saja, misalnya jalan yang dikasih trotoar ini masyarakat setuju apa enggak? Ini sangat melukai masyarakat," tutupnya.

Expert: It's only natural for DKI Jakarta Provincial Government TKD to be High
04 Nov 2019, 11:02 by Mosita Dwi Septiasputri


Expert: It's only natural for DKI Jakarta Provincial Government TKD to be High

KBRN, Jakarta: Regional Autonomy Expert Prof. Djohermansyah Djohan considers it reasonable if ASN DKI Jakarta Provincial Government gets Regional Performance Allowance (TKD) on condition that ASNs can fulfill the obligations that have been given. "So that he can live well enough to be able to send his children to school, they can finance their needs. So that is indeed legitimate," he explained to RRI, Monday (11/04/2019). According to the public money, it must be used for good things. The public certainly hopes that the government can provide good services to the public. "But also the public is asking for this, okay the salary is added, the performance allowance is increased but also must have achievements, have high performance, public services must be good, and there must be no corruption because of that public money, "he said. He said that it was the state's obligation to provide high benefits for its ASNs, as long as the ASNs could continue to provide the best service to the public." I as an expert see that as a matter of course, the state and local governments also must provide facilities, provide good income to its employees if they are paid well then the performance will be good, if people are paid low then the performance will also be low, "he concluded. Meanwhile, Executive Director of the Center for Budget Analysis (CBA) Uchok Sky Khadafi assessed the high The Regional Performance Allowance (TKD) of the DKI Jakarta Provincial Government is not in line with the performance of the DKI Jakarta Provincial Government akarta. Until now, DKI Jakarta Provincial Government's service is considered to be slow and does not open up suggestions for the community. "TKD is very large indeed, let alone the regional government, the central government alone can be outdone by this allowance TKD, if we look at this the allowance must be aligned with the performance with what what they make, DKI services are still very slow and ugly, "he explained to RRI, Monday (11/04/2019). For that, the DKI Provincial Government must increase infrastructure in Jakarta by involving the community. Opening public facilities, so the voice of the community can be a consideration for the Provincial Government of DKI. "If the service period is like that, yes, for example in hospitals there are still lines of schools that are still damaged, not good, the roads are still many holes, DKI is sometimes lacking opening public participation is not opened its space, just playing built-up, for example the road given by the sidewalk does the community agree or not? This really hurts the community, "he concluded.
